The Embalmer is the embalmer of Sophanem. He is responsible for embalming the bodies of the dead, and is involved in the Icthlarin's Little Helper quest and runs the shop The Spice Is Right. He is near the temple in the south-west side of town.

When using a Potion on him from the apothecary, he will comment on how if he thought his plague spots were curable, he would instead have made the potion himself. He is seen in a cutscene in Contact! as part of the High Priest's delegation.

The High Priest leads a delegation of Sophanites to parlay with Menaphos.
